text: Out of all the parts of Italy that I've been to before I feel more like a little white English boy
than i ever have done before.
I think I've arranged to meet the guys at about four.
So we're on the grill tonight.

Me and you on the 'griglia'?
The truth is
I don't know why the bloody hell I'm doing this and I'm a bit scared.

and the sauces are ready,
but contrary to our earlier agreement Mr grill-man is having none of it.

life shaping
experiences.
I ask him where I'm going to put it because I don't,

is getting the arse ache because my fish tastes better.
